channel.title: Consultant required for IATI data use research and analysis
channel.description:
IATI Secretariat member [Development Initiatives](http://devinit.org/#!/) (DI) is looking for an experienced consultant to work for up to 10 days between July and September 2016 to undertake a systematic analysis of existing **IATI data use**. Use cases and user categories, as well as the opportunities and challenges encountered by data users, will be included in a study by the consultant. The study will synthesise and systematise existing experience, building on previous work rather than starting from scratch.
The consultant should be able to demonstrate a strong knowledge of, and familiarity with, IATI and the wider data for development/data revolution agenda.
The qualification criteria and timeframe, as well as details on how to apply, are provided on DI’s [vacancies page](http://devinit.org/#!/about/vacancies).**The deadline to submit applications is 28 June 2016.**
